product_name: Louis Garneau Corsa Bike Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: You'll love the feel and performance of the women's Louis Garneau Corsa Bike Shorts. The dimpled mesh fabric is designed to wick away sweat quickly and improve aerodynamics. Laser-cut, seamless Aero Lazer band on each leg feels smooth and supports your muscles. Innovative chamomis has preshaped wings and a deep back split for superb comfort. Perforated high-density foam in chamois keeps its shape while venting away moisture. Louis Garneau Corsa Bike Shorts have an ergonomic fit and comfy Huggfit waist. Back and bottom reflective logos. Closeout.
short_description: You'll love the feel and performance of the women's Louis Garneau Corsa Bike Shorts. The dimpled mesh fabric is designed to wick away sweat quickly and improve aerodynamics.
